name: Face
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Face
description:
Face

The results of face detection.

See Annotation#faces and Annotation#face.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/vision"

vision = Google::Cloud::Vision.new

image = vision.image "path/to/face.jpg"

face = image.face
face.confidence #=> 0.86162376

methods.name: angles
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Face#angles
methods.description: The angles of the face, including roll, yaw, and pitch.

methods.name: bounds
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Face#bounds
methods.description: The bounds of the face, including the polygons for the head and face.

methods.name: features
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Face#features
methods.description: The landmarks of the face, including the points for the eyes, ears, nose and mouth.

methods.name: likelihood
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Face#likelihood
methods.description: The likelihood of the facial detection, including joy, sorrow, anger, surprise, under_exposed, blurred, and headwear.

methods.name: to_h
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Face#to_h
methods.description: Deeply converts object to a hash. All keys will be symbolized.
